DataElement.preferredDefinition: used informally to mean a class of things related to the evaluation of decay of a tooth by putting in a system for classifying into groups.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of decay of a tooth by putting in a system for classifying into groups.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.

Concepts.definition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.

Property.preferredDefinition: Grouping; a system for classifying things into groups; the activity of putting things together in groups.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A system for classifying things into groups or the activity of putting things together in groups.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: used informally to mean a class of things for grouping the caries diagnosis.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Distinct cavity with visible dentin, extensive lesion

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
